name: mithril-leaflet
description: A Leaflet drawable map component for mithril.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:local && lerna run clean --parallel
scripts.patch-release: lerna run build:domain --parallel && lerna run patch-release --parallel
scripts.minor-release: lerna run build:domain --parallel && lerna run minor-release --parallel

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)
